SetUpBusinessProfile.title_1: Do you want to set up a Business Profile?
SetUpBusinessProfile.description: Reach more customers, showcase your products, and grow your business with your online seller profile.

StepOne.heading: Owner's Name
StepOne.sub-heading: For single-owner businesses, enter your full name.

StepTwo.heading: Business Type
StepTwo.sub-heading: What type of business are you running?
StepTwo.label: Business Type
StepTwo.placeholder: e.g., Grocery Store, Retail Shop, Restaurant

StepThree.heading: Where is your Shop Located?
StepThree.sub-heading: Address and Location of your business or shop.

StepFour.heading: Store Name
StepFour.sub-heading: Your Store or Business Name (leave blank if none).

StepFive.heading: Business Profile Image
StepFive.sub-heading: Upload an Image of your store, logo, or business owner.

StepSix.heading: Review Your Profile
StepSix.sub-heading: Please review your business profile information before submitting.
StepSix.edit-message: Need to make changes? You can go back and edit any information.
